itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down Joe Biden’s first press conference as president, if Biden and Democrats will get an assault weapons ban through, the mass shooting in Boulder and how Twitter liberals immediately changed their tune when they found out the shooter wasn’t a white man, why Dan thinks Iran is the Dallas Cowboys of world powers, and the Biden Administration’s handling of the border crisis (and how the media covers it).
